nervous at the sound of cave-ins or landslides.

it felt different from a landslide. 
I had a bad premonition,

and ruled by a noble lord.
But one day, he was betrayed by his subordinates
and lost his life in the forest.

Recently, I've noticed a significant drop in game
in the depths of the Mysree Forest, and it turns
out that a dangerous dragon has taken up residence
there. It seems it chose some ancient ruins as
its lair. If this situation continues, hunters like
us will be out of business.
I hope someone can do something about it.
